Verses: 1 ovvondrirkum Ovvoru Kaalamundu; Vaanaththin Keezhirukkira Ovvoru Kaariyaththukkum Ovvoru Samayamundu.
2 pirakka Oru Kaalamundu, Irakka Oru Kaalamundu; Nada Oru Kaalamundu, Nattadhaip Pidunga Oru Kaalamundu;
3 kolla Oru Kaalamundu, Gunamaakka Oru Kaalamundu; Idikka Oru Kaalamundu, Katta Oru Kaalamundu;
4 azha Oru Kaalamundu, Nagaikka Oru Kaalamundu; Pulamba Oru Kaalamundu, Nadanampanna Oru Kaalamundu;
5 karkalai Erindhuvida Oru Kaalamundu, Karkalai Serkka Oru Kaalamundu; Thazhuva Oru Kaalamundu, Thazhuvaamalirukka Oru Kaalamundu;
6 theda Oru Kaalamundu, Izhakka Oru Kaalamundu; Kaappaatra Oru Kaalamundu, Erindhuvida Oru Kaalamundu;
7 kizhikka Oru Kaalamundu, Thaikka Oru Kaalamundu; Mavunamaayirukka Oru Kaalamundu, Pesa Oru Kaalamundu;
8 snegikka Oru Kaalamundu, Pagaikka Oru Kaalamundu; Yuththampanna Oru Kaalamundu, Samaadhaanampanna Oru Kaalamundu.
9 varuththappattup Prayaasappadugiravanukku Adhinaal Palan Enna?
10 manupuththirar Paadupadumpadi Dhevan Avargalukku Niyamiththa Thollaiyaik Kanden.

11 avar Sagalaththaiyum Adhinadhin Kaalaththile Nerththiyaaga Seydhirukkiraar; Ulagaththaiyum Avargal Ullaththile Vaiththirukkiraar; Aadhalaal Dhevan Aadhimudhal Andhammattum Seydhuvarum Kiriyaiyai Manushan Kandupidiyaan.
12 magizhchchiyaayiruppadhum, Uyirodirukkaiyil Nanmaiseyvadhumeyallaamal, Veroru Nanmaiyum Manushanukku Illaiyendru Arindhen.
13 andriyum Manushar Yaavarum Pusiththuk Kudiththuth Thangal Sagalap Prayaasaththin Palanaiyum Anubavippadhu Dhevanudaiya Anukkiragam.

14 dhevan Seyvadhu Edhuvo Adhu Endraikkum Nilaikkum Endru Ariven; Adhinode Ondrum Koottavun Koodaadhu, Adhilirundhu Ondrum Kuraikkavun Koodaadhu; Manushar Thamadhu Samugaththil Bayandhirukkumpadi Dhevan Ippadi Seydhuvarugiraar.
15 mun Nadandhadhe Ippozhudhum Nadakkiradhu; Ini Nadakkappogiradhum Munname Nadandhadhu; Nadandhadhaiyo Dhevan Visaarippaar.
16 pinnum Sooriyanukkuk Keezhe Naan Nyaayasthalaththaik Kanden, Ange Aniyaayam Irundhadhu; Needhi Sthalaththaiyum Kanden, Ange Aneedhi Irundhadhu.
17 sagala Ennangalaiyum Sagala Seygaigalaiyum Nyaayantheerkkunkaalam Ini Irukkirapadiyaal Sanmaarkkanaiyum Dhunmaarkkanaiyum Dhevan Nyaayantheerkkiraar Endru En Ullaththil Enninen.
18 manupuththirar Thaangal Mirugangalaippol Irukkiraargalenbadhai Avargal Ariyumpadikku Dhevan Avargalai Sodhikkiraarendru Naan Manusharudaiya Nilaimaiyaikkuriththu En Ullaththile Enninen.

19 manupuththirarukku Sambavikkiradhu Mirugangalukkum Sambavikkum; Avargalukkum Ivaigalukkum Ega Sambavamundu; Ivaigal Saagiradhupolave Ivargalum Saagiraargal; Jeevangalukkellaam Suvaasam Ondre; Mirugaththaippaarkkilum Manushan Menmaiyullavan Alla; Ellaam Maayaiye.
20 ellaam Ore Idaththukkup Pogiradhu; Ellaam Mannile Undaagiradhu, Ellaam Mannukkuth Thirumbugiradhu.
21 uyara Erum Manushanudaiya Aaviyaiyum, Thaazha Boomiyilirangum Mirugangaludaiya Aaviyaiyum Arigiravan Yaar?

22 ippadiyirukkirapadiyaal, Manushan Than Seygaigalil Magizhchchiyaayirukkum Nanmaiyaiyeyallaamal, Vere Nanmaiyillaiyendru Kanden; Idhuve Avan Pangu; Thanakkup Pinvarum Kaariyangalaik Kaanumpadikku Avanaith Thirumbivarappannugiravan Yaar?
